title: Non-Metro cities see a big growth in credit demand: Report
description: Kanpur and Barabanki emerge as top cities for credit demand, beyond metros. BT100 cities dominate two-wheeler and auto loans, with public banks leading in auto and home loans. Festival spending boosts lending across various regions.
